attributes.action: We the people demand that parliament gives us a general election forthwith.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament & the Lords have shown little regard for the wishes of 17.4 million & the referendum even to the point of overturning an Action by her majesty on the 24th September this year.

The Electorate should now decide who governs at this critical time in our history.
attributes.background: We now need a general election for the public to decide who we want to take us through to being an independent country after October 31st.
